tasks.help: Prepares a project to have version stamps applied using Nerdbank.GitVersioning.

properties.name: Path
properties.help: The path to the directory that should contain the version.json file. The default is the root of the git repo.

properties.name: Version
properties.help: The initial version to set. The default is <c>1.0-beta</c>.

properties.name: Sources
properties.help: The URI(s) of the NuGet package source(s) used to determine the latest stable version of the Nerdbank.GitVersioning package. This setting overrides all of the sources specified in the NuGet.Config files.

tasks.help: Gets the version information for a project.

properties.name: Project
properties.help: The path to the project or project directory. The default is the current directory.

properties.name: Metadata
properties.help: Adds an identifier to the build metadata part of a semantic version.

properties.name: Format
properties.help: The format to write the version information. Allowed values are: <c>text</c>, <c>json</c>. The default is <c>text</c>.

properties.name: Variable
properties.help: The name of just one version property to print to stdout. When specified, the output is always in raw text. Useful in scripts.

properties.name: CommitIsh
properties.help: The commit/ref to get the version information for. The default is <c>HEAD</c>.

tasks.help: Updates the version stamp that is applied to a project.

properties.name: Project
properties.help: The path to the project or project directory. The default is the root directory of the repo that spans the current directory, or an existing version.json file, if applicable.

properties.name: Version
properties.help: The version to set.

tasks.help: Creates a git tag to mark a version.

properties.name: Project
properties.help: The path to the project or project directory. The default is the root directory of the repo that spans the current directory, or an existing version.json file, if applicable.

properties.name: VersionOrRef
properties.help: The <c>a.b.c[.d]</c> version or git ref to be tagged. If not specified, <c>HEAD</c> is used.

tasks.help: Gets the commit(s) that match a given version.

properties.name: Project
properties.help: The path to the project or project directory. The default is the root directory of the repo that spans the current directory, or an existing version.json file, if applicable.

properties.name: Quiet
properties.help: Use minimal output.

properties.name: Version
properties.help: The <c>a.b.c[.d]</c> version to find.

tasks.help: Communicates with the ambient cloud build to set the build number and/or other cloud build variables.

properties.name: Project
properties.help: The path to the project or project directory used to calculate the version. The default is the current directory. Ignored if the <c>--version</c> option is specified.

properties.name: Metadata
properties.help: Adds an identifier to the build metadata part of a semantic version.

properties.name: Version
properties.help: The string to use for the cloud build number. If not specified, the computed version will be used.

properties.name: CISystem
properties.help: Force activation for a particular CI system. If not specified, auto-detection will be used.

properties.name: AllVars
properties.help: Defines ALL version variables as cloud build variables, with a <c>NBGV_</c> prefix.

properties.name: CommonVars
properties.help: Defines a few common version variables as cloud build variables, with a <c>Git</c> prefix (e.g. <c>GitBuildVersion</c>, <c>GitBuildVersionSimple</c>, <c>GitAssemblyInformationalVersion</c>)

properties.name: Variables
properties.help: Additional cloud build variables to define.

tasks.help: Prepares a release by creating a release branch for the current version and adjusting the version on the current branch.

properties.name: Project
properties.help: The path to the project or project directory. The default is the current directory.

properties.name: NextVersion
properties.help: The version to set for the current branch. If omitted, the next version is determined automatically by incrementing the current version.

properties.name: VersionIncrement
properties.help: Overrides the 'versionIncrement' setting set in version.json for determining the next version of the current branch.

properties.name: Tag
properties.help: The prerelease tag to apply on the release branch (if any). If not specified, any existing prerelease tag will be removed. The preceding hyphen may be omitted.
